thread.section_title: Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Midtown East - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Might be the only reason I go back to Marriott
thread.title_full: Might be the only reason I go back to Marriott - Review of Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Midtown East, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: David C
title: Might be the only reason I go back to Marriott
text: Great place to stay in NY. Great people and helpful. Nice rooms and great work out facility. Would definitely stay again. The location was great and I liked how open the lobby was. Can't say enough good things about this place. I travel a lot for business and was pretty frustrated with Marriott so started doing Hiltons and Hyatt. But, this was a great experience and may consider going back to Marriott.
